title: oc6 - files app - a spinning wheel is shown in front of a renamed folder
body:
## expected behavior

if a directory is renamed this activity should instantly be finished.

## actual behavior

if you rename a folder, a spinning wheel is shown in front of the renamed folder which never stops spinning, although the rename process seems to have already been finished. if you click on the new folder name it is opened instantly without any error message. there seems to be no related message in the log file which could unveil the root cause of the problem.

![20131213_oc6_rename_folder_spinning_wheel](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2572764/1742826/b499ced8-6402-11e3-9baa-811612d35079.png)

## steps to reproduce

1.) click on `rename` behind a folder, you want to rename.
2.) enter the new folder name and press enter.

## environment:

#### server configuration

os: linux 2.6.24-24
web server: apache2 2.4.6
database: mysql 5.1.72
php version: 5.4.21
owncloud version: 6.0


#### client configuration

browser: firefox 26.0
operating system: windows 7
